name: hero-section-02
description: Centered vertical hero with motion animations, horizontal tabbed interface below content, form grids with calendar popover integration, background imagery, and interactive booking workflow

// React Imports
import type { SVGAttributes } from 'react'

const Logo = (props: SVGAttributes<SVGElement>) => {
  return (

    </svg>
  )
}

export default Logo
